abstract: For the Jonas Brothers, CD sales are sluggish, concert tickets are selling well and the television series is doing a bit better since it switched nights.
snippet: For the Jonas Brothers, CD sales are sluggish, concert tickets are selling well and the television series is doing a bit better since it switched nights.
lead_paragraph: “What happens when the little girls stop screaming?” muses Rolling Stone in its latest issue about the Jonas Brothers, the Walt Disney Company-backed music and television stars.

headline.main: ‘What Happens When the Little Girls Stop Screaming?’
